name: The Faith Released
description:
The Faith is an action RPG. Chris the main character in this game, is sent with Samson, her guard to find the witch responsible for causing the people in Mu to be involved in rebellion. She/he will battle demon possessed creatures that are sent by the witches he/she is on a mission to stop.

Player can choose to play with either male or female main character. Please try the demo. The demo will have game play on up to the first boss battle.

After learning some things from people on the unity3d forum, I decided to release this game Free of Charge.

(6-8-2016)

Controls;

'1' = Alchemy skills

'2' = Prayer skills

'g' = activate (npc, pickup item)

'esc' = main menu

's', 'f', 'e', 'd' = directional

'left click' = activate

'middle click' = melee attack

'space bar' = change Samson battle mode

'i inventory alchemy stock view'

'a hold' run action

'c' cancel skill select

Known Bugs:

1) Samson does not grow stronger when leveling, this has been fixed in the full version.

News for full version 8-27-2016

Game is finished, but might still get patch update.
